saql_directs_quota_attainment.query: a = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.opportunity_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; a = filter a by {{cell(intermediate_step.result, 0, "Role.Role.ForecastUserId").asEquality("Owner.Role.Role.ParentRole.ForecastUserId")}}; a = filter a by 'Owner.ForecastEnabled' == "true"; a = group a by 'OwnerId'; a = foreach a generate 'OwnerId', first('User.Name') as 'User.Name', first('Owner.SmallPhotoUrl') as 'Owner.SmallPhotoUrl', row_number() over([..] partition by all order by 'OwnerId' asc) as 'row_num'; a = foreach a generate 'OwnerId', 'User.Name', 'Owner.SmallPhotoUrl', 'row_num', case when 'row_num'==1 then 1000 else 'row_num' end as 'row_num_temp',  substr("{{coalesce(column(soql_directs_forecast.result, ["ForecastAmount"]),"[0,0,0]").asString())}}",2,len("{{coalesce(column(soql_directs_forecast.result, ["ForecastAmount"]),"[0,0,0]").asString())}}")-2) + "," as 'ForecastAmounts',  substr("{{coalesce(column(soql_directs_quota.result, ["QuotaAmount"]),"[0,0,0]").asString())}}",2,len("{{coalesce(column(soql_directs_quota.result, ["QuotaAmount"]),"[0,0,0]").asString())}}")-2) + "," as 'QuotaAmounts'; a = foreach a generate 'OwnerId', 'User.Name', 'Owner.SmallPhotoUrl', 'row_num', 'row_num_temp', index_of('ForecastAmounts',",",1,'row_num') as 'forecast_index', index_of('ForecastAmounts',",",1,'row_num_temp'-1) as 'forecast_index_prev', 'ForecastAmounts', index_of('QuotaAmounts',",",1,'row_num') as 'quota_index', index_of('QuotaAmounts',",",1,'row_num_temp'-1) as 'quota_index_prev', 'QuotaAmounts'; a = foreach a generate 'OwnerId', 'User.Name', 'Owner.SmallPhotoUrl', 'row_num', 'forecast_index', 'forecast_index_prev', 'quota_index', 'quota_index_prev', substr('ForecastAmounts','forecast_index_prev'+1,'forecast_index'-'forecast_index_prev'-1) as 'ForecastAmount', 'ForecastAmounts', substr('QuotaAmounts','quota_index_prev'+1,'quota_index'-'quota_index_prev'-1) as 'QuotaAmount', 'QuotaAmounts'; a = foreach a generate 'OwnerId', 'User.Name', 'Owner.SmallPhotoUrl', 'row_num', 'forecast_index', 'forecast_index_prev', 'quota_index', 'quota_index_prev', 'ForecastAmount', 'ForecastAmounts', 'QuotaAmount', 'QuotaAmounts', string_to_number('ForecastAmount')/string_to_number('QuotaAmount') as 'Quota_Attainment'; a = foreach a generate 'User.Name', 'Owner.SmallPhotoUrl', 'ForecastAmount', 'QuotaAmount', 'Quota_Attainment'; a = order a by 'Quota_Attainment' desc; a = limit a 100;

values.final_projection: avg('Avg Sales Size') as 'Avg Sales Size'
avg('Avg Days to Close') as 'Avg Days to Close'

columns.name: GapToQuotaWeekAgo
columns.header: Gap To Quota a Week Ago

query.formula: (case when 'PipeCoverageDiff' > 0 then "#067D1E" when 'PipeCoverageDiff' < 0 then "#E3193B" else "#192B61" end)
(case when 'ClosedWonDiff' > 0 then "#067D1E" when 'ClosedWonDiff' < 0 then "#E3193B" else "#192B61" end)
(case when 'CommitForecastDiff' > 0 then "#067D1E" when 'CommitForecastDiff' < 0 then "#E3193B" else "#192B61" end)
(case when 'GapToQuotaDiff' > 0 then "#067D1E" when 'GapToQuotaDiff' < 0 then "#E3193B" else "#192B61" end)

Time_Stamp.query: q = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.opportunity_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate now() as 'Current_Time'; q = foreach q generate "Today: " + toString('Current_Time', "MMM dd, yyyy") + " | " + number_to_string(daysBetween('Current_Time', quarter_last_day('Current_Time')),"##0") + " days left in quarter" as 'time', number_to_string(daysBetween('Current_Time', fiscal_quarter_last_day('Current_Time')),"##0") as 'days_left_in_quarter', toString('Current_Time', "yyyy/MM/dd") as 'today_date';

values.final_projection: avg('Avg Sales Size') as 'Avg Sales Size'
avg('Avg Days to Close') as 'Avg Days to Close'
avg('Avg Sales Size') as 'Avg Sales Size'
avg('Avg Days to Close') as 'Avg Days to Close'

soql_user_open_pipeline.query: SELECT ForecastAmount,ForecastingItemCategory,Owner.Name,Owner.UserRole.ParentRoleId, Period.StartDate FROM ForecastingItem {{toArray( toArray("Owner.UserRoleId", "IN", row(intermediate_step.result, [0], ["UserRoleId"])),toArray("ForecastingTypeId", "IN", row(forecasting_type.selection, [0], ["ForecastingTypeId"])), toArray("OwnerId", "IN", row(intermediate_step.result, [0], ["Id"])), toArray("Period.StartDate", "BETWEEN", row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]))).asSQLWhere("sobject", true)}} AND ForecastingItemCategory = 'OpenPipeline'

soql_directs_forecast.query: SELECT ForecastAmount,ForecastingItemCategory,OwnerId,Owner.Name,Owner.UserRole.ParentRoleId, Period.StartDate FROM ForecastingItem {{toArray(toArray("Owner.UserRole.ParentRoleId", "IN", row(intermediate_step.result, [0], ["UserRoleId"])), toArray("ForecastingTypeId", "IN", row(forecasting_type.selection, [0], ["ForecastingTypeId"])), toArray("Period.StartDate", "BETWEEN", row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]))).asSQLWhere("sobject", true)}} AND ForecastingItemCategory = 'ClosedOnly' ORDER BY OwnerId

soql_directs_quota.query: SELECT ForecastingTypeId,PeriodId,QuotaAmount,QuotaOwnerId, QuotaOwner.Name, QuotaOwner.UserRole.Name, QuotaOwner.UserRole.ParentRoleId, StartDate FROM ForecastingQuota {{toArray(toArray("QuotaOwner.UserRole.ParentRoleId", "IN", row(intermediate_step.result, [0], ["UserRoleId"])), toArray("ForecastingTypeId", "IN", row(forecasting_type.selection, [0], ["ForecastingTypeId"])), toArray("StartDate", "BETWEEN", row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]))).asSQLWhere("sobject", true)}} ORDER BY QuotaOwnerId

ForecastsTimeline_1.label: ForecastsTimeline

TeamStats_1.label: TeamStats

time_series_with_forecast.query: q = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.opportunity_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = filter q by 'ForecastCategory' == "Closed"; q = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [.."current day"]; result = group q by ('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day'); result = foreach result generate q.'CloseDate_Year' + "~~~" + q.'CloseDate_Month' + "~~~" + q.'CloseDate_Day' as 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Month~~~CloseDate_Day', sum(q.'Amount') as 'A'; result = group result by 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Month~~~CloseDate_Day'; result = foreach result generate 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Month~~~CloseDate_Day', first(A) as 'A', sum(sum(A)) over ([..0] partition by all order by ('CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Month~~~CloseDate_Day')) as 'Cumulative_Amount'; result = order result by ('CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Month~~~CloseDate_Day' asc); start_forecast = group result by all; start_forecast = foreach start_forecast generate last('CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Month~~~CloseDate_Day') as 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Month~~~CloseDate_Day', last('Cumulative_Amount') as 'Cumulative_Amount'; a1 = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.opportunity_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; a1 = group a1 by all; end_forecast = foreach a1 generate "{{cell(time_period.result, 0, "last_day_in_time_period").asString()}}" as 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Month~~~CloseDate_Day', {{coalesce(cell(soql_user_commit_forecast.result, 0, "ForecastAmount"),0).asString()}} as 'Cumulative_Amount'; forecast_line = union start_forecast, end_forecast; final = group result by 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Month~~~CloseDate_Day' full, forecast_line by 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Month~~~CloseDate_Day'; final = foreach final generate coalesce(result['CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Month~~~CloseDate_Day'], forecast_line['CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Month~~~CloseDate_Day']) as 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Month~~~CloseDate_Day', first(result['Cumulative_Amount']) as 'Closed Won Sales', first(forecast_line['Cumulative_Amount']) as 'Commit Forecast';

Team_Performance_1.query: u = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.userrole_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; a = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.opportunity_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = filter a by 'IsWon' == "true"; r = filter a by 'IsClosed' == "true"; Avg_Day = filter a by 'IsClosed' == "true" && 'IsWon' == "true"; OpptyCount_Left = filter a by {{cell(team_selector_1.selection,0, "filter").asObject()}}; AvgDeal_Left = filter a by {{cell(team_selector_1.selection,0, "filter").asObject()}}; leftpipe = filter a by {{cell(team_selector_1.selection,0, "filter").asObject()}}; Activities = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.Activity.FullyQualifiedName}"; Activities = group Activities by ('User.UniqueUserName', 'Opp.IsClosed'); Activities = foreach Activities generate 'User.UniqueUserName' as 'User.UniqueUserName', 'Opp.IsClosed' as 'Opp.IsClosed', count() as 'count'; Completed_Activities = filter Activities by 'Opp.IsClosed' == "true"; Percentage = group Completed_Activities by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, Activities by 'User.UniqueUserName'; Percentage = foreach Percentage generate Activities['User.UniqueUserName'] as 'User.UniqueUserName', coalesce( sum(Completed_Activities['count']) / sum(Activities['count']), 0) as 'CompletedRate'; Percentage_Left = group Completed_Activities by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, Activities by 'User.UniqueUserName'; Percentage_Left = foreach Percentage_Left generate Activities['User.UniqueUserName'] as 'User.UniqueUserName', coalesce( sum(Completed_Activities['count']) / sum(Activities['count']), 0) as 'CompletedRate_Left'; quota = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.forecastingquota_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; c = group u by 'UniqueUserName' full, OpptyCount_Left by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, AvgDeal_Left by 'User.UniqueUserName' full ,q by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, r by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, quota by 'Quota.UniqueUserName' full, Avg_Day by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, leftpipe by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, Percentage by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, Percentage_Left by 'User.UniqueUserName'; c = foreach c generate coalesce(first(u['UniqueUserName']), first(q['User.UniqueUserName']), first(AvgDeal_Left['User.UniqueUserName']), first(OpptyCount_Left['User.UniqueUserName']), first(r['User.UniqueUserName']), first(quota['Quota.UniqueUserName']), first(Avg_Day['User.UniqueUserName']), first(Percentage['User.UniqueUserName']), first(Percentage_Left['User.UniqueUserName'])) as 'UniqueUserName',  coalesce(sum(q['Amount']),0) as 'sum_Amount', (coalesce(sum(AvgDeal_Left['Amount']),0) / coalesce(count(OpptyCount_Left),0))  as 'sum_left_DealAmount', coalesce(count(OpptyCount_Left),0) as 'sum_left_count', coalesce(sum(leftpipe['Amount']),0) as 'sum_pipe', coalesce((sum(Avg_Day['CloseDate_day_epoch']) - sum(Avg_Day['CreatedDate_day_epoch']))/count(Avg_Day),0) as 'sum_DaysOpen',  coalesce(count(q) / count(r),0) as 'sum_win_rate', coalesce(sum(Percentage_Left['CompletedRate_Left']),0) as 'sum_LeftActivity', coalesce(sum(q['Amount']) / sum(quota['QuotaAmount']),0) as 'sum_QuotaAmount'; c = foreach c generate 'UniqueUserName' as 'UniqueUserName', {{cell(team_selector_1.selection,0, "first_f").asObject()}}; c = order c by ('{{cell(team_selector_1.selection,0, "left").asObject()}}' desc nulls last);

Team_Performance_2.query: u = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.userrole_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; a = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.opportunity_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = filter a by 'IsWon' == "true"; r = filter a by 'IsClosed' == "true"; Avg_Day = filter a by 'IsClosed' == "true" && 'IsWon' == "true"; OpptyCount_Left = filter a by {{cell(team_selector_2.selection,0, "filter").asObject()}}; AvgDeal_Left = filter a by {{cell(team_selector_2.selection,0, "filter").asObject()}}; leftpipe = filter a by {{cell(team_selector_2.selection,0, "filter").asObject()}}; Activities = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.Activity.FullyQualifiedName}"; Activities = group Activities by ('User.UniqueUserName', 'Opp.IsClosed'); Activities = foreach Activities generate 'User.UniqueUserName' as 'User.UniqueUserName', 'Opp.IsClosed' as 'Opp.IsClosed', count() as 'count'; Completed_Activities = filter Activities by 'Opp.IsClosed' == "true"; Percentage = group Completed_Activities by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, Activities by 'User.UniqueUserName'; Percentage = foreach Percentage generate Activities['User.UniqueUserName'] as 'User.UniqueUserName', coalesce( sum(Completed_Activities['count']) / sum(Activities['count']), 0) as 'CompletedRate'; Percentage_Left = group Completed_Activities by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, Activities by 'User.UniqueUserName'; Percentage_Left = foreach Percentage_Left generate Activities['User.UniqueUserName'] as 'User.UniqueUserName', coalesce( sum(Completed_Activities['count']) / sum(Activities['count']), 0) as 'CompletedRate_Left'; quota = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.forecastingquota_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; c = group u by 'UniqueUserName' full, OpptyCount_Left by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, AvgDeal_Left by 'User.UniqueUserName' full ,q by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, r by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, quota by 'Quota.UniqueUserName' full, Avg_Day by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, leftpipe by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, Percentage by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, Percentage_Left by 'User.UniqueUserName'; c = foreach c generate coalesce(first(u['UniqueUserName']), first(q['User.UniqueUserName']), first(AvgDeal_Left['User.UniqueUserName']), first(OpptyCount_Left['User.UniqueUserName']), first(r['User.UniqueUserName']), first(quota['Quota.UniqueUserName']), first(Avg_Day['User.UniqueUserName']), first(Percentage['User.UniqueUserName']), first(Percentage_Left['User.UniqueUserName'])) as 'UniqueUserName',  coalesce(sum(q['Amount']),0) as 'sum_Amount', (coalesce(sum(AvgDeal_Left['Amount']),0) / coalesce(count(OpptyCount_Left),0))  as 'sum_left_DealAmount', coalesce(count(OpptyCount_Left),0) as 'sum_left_count', coalesce(sum(leftpipe['Amount']),0) as 'sum_pipe', coalesce((sum(Avg_Day['CloseDate_day_epoch']) - sum(Avg_Day['CreatedDate_day_epoch']))/count(Avg_Day),0) as 'sum_DaysOpen',  coalesce(count(q) / count(r),0) as 'sum_win_rate', coalesce(sum(Percentage_Left['CompletedRate_Left']),0) as 'sum_LeftActivity', coalesce(sum(q['Amount']) / sum(quota['QuotaAmount']),0) as 'sum_QuotaAmount'; c = foreach c generate 'UniqueUserName' as 'UniqueUserName', {{cell(team_selector_2.selection,0, "first_f").asObject()}}; c = order c by ('{{cell(team_selector_2.selection,0, "left").asObject()}}' desc nulls last);

saql_user_quota_attainment.query: a = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.opportunity_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; a = filter a by 'OwnerId' == "{{cell(intermediate_step.result, 0, "Role.Role.ForecastUserId").asString()}}"; a = group a by 'OwnerId'; a = foreach a generate 'OwnerId', first('User.Name') as 'User.Name', first('Owner.SmallPhotoUrl') as 'Owner.SmallPhotoUrl', {{coalesce(cell(soql_user_commit_forecast.result, 0, "ForecastAmount"),0).asString()}} as 'ForecastAmount', {{coalesce(cell(soql_user_quota.result, 0, "QuotaAmount"),0).asString()}} as 'QuotaAmount'; a = foreach a generate 'OwnerId', 'User.Name', 'Owner.SmallPhotoUrl', 'ForecastAmount', 'QuotaAmount', 'ForecastAmount'/'QuotaAmount' as 'Quota_Attainment';

Team_Performance_3.query: u = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.userrole_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; a = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.opportunity_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = filter a by 'IsWon' == "true"; r = filter a by 'IsClosed' == "true"; Avg_Day = filter a by 'IsClosed' == "true" && 'IsWon' == "true"; OpptyCount_Left = filter a by {{cell(team_selector_3.selection,0, "filter").asObject()}}; AvgDeal_Left = filter a by {{cell(team_selector_3.selection,0, "filter").asObject()}}; leftpipe = filter a by {{cell(team_selector_3.selection,0, "filter").asObject()}}; Activities = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.Activity.FullyQualifiedName}"; Activities = group Activities by ('User.UniqueUserName', 'Opp.IsClosed'); Activities = foreach Activities generate 'User.UniqueUserName' as 'User.UniqueUserName', 'Opp.IsClosed' as 'Opp.IsClosed', count() as 'count'; Completed_Activities = filter Activities by 'Opp.IsClosed' == "true"; Percentage = group Completed_Activities by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, Activities by 'User.UniqueUserName'; Percentage = foreach Percentage generate Activities['User.UniqueUserName'] as 'User.UniqueUserName', coalesce( sum(Completed_Activities['count']) / sum(Activities['count']), 0) as 'CompletedRate'; Percentage_Left = group Completed_Activities by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, Activities by 'User.UniqueUserName'; Percentage_Left = foreach Percentage_Left generate Activities['User.UniqueUserName'] as 'User.UniqueUserName', coalesce( sum(Completed_Activities['count']) / sum(Activities['count']), 0) as 'CompletedRate_Left'; quota = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.forecastingquota_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; c = group u by 'UniqueUserName' full, OpptyCount_Left by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, AvgDeal_Left by 'User.UniqueUserName' full ,q by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, r by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, quota by 'Quota.UniqueUserName' full, Avg_Day by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, leftpipe by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, Percentage by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, Percentage_Left by 'User.UniqueUserName'; c = foreach c generate coalesce(first(u['UniqueUserName']), first(q['User.UniqueUserName']), first(AvgDeal_Left['User.UniqueUserName']), first(OpptyCount_Left['User.UniqueUserName']), first(r['User.UniqueUserName']), first(quota['Quota.UniqueUserName']), first(Avg_Day['User.UniqueUserName']), first(Percentage['User.UniqueUserName']), first(Percentage_Left['User.UniqueUserName'])) as 'UniqueUserName',  coalesce(sum(q['Amount']),0) as 'sum_Amount', (coalesce(sum(AvgDeal_Left['Amount']),0) / coalesce(count(OpptyCount_Left),0))  as 'sum_left_DealAmount', coalesce(count(OpptyCount_Left),0) as 'sum_left_count', coalesce(sum(leftpipe['Amount']),0) as 'sum_pipe', coalesce((sum(Avg_Day['CloseDate_day_epoch']) - sum(Avg_Day['CreatedDate_day_epoch']))/count(Avg_Day),0) as 'sum_DaysOpen',  coalesce(count(q) / count(r),0) as 'sum_win_rate', coalesce(sum(Percentage_Left['CompletedRate_Left']),0) as 'sum_LeftActivity', coalesce(sum(q['Amount']) / sum(quota['QuotaAmount']),0) as 'sum_QuotaAmount'; c = foreach c generate 'UniqueUserName' as 'UniqueUserName', {{cell(team_selector_3.selection,0, "first_f").asObject()}}; c = order c by ('{{cell(team_selector_3.selection,0, "left").asObject()}}' desc nulls last);

r = filter a by 'IsClosed' == "true"; Avg_Day = filter a by 'IsClosed' == "true" && 'IsWon' == "true"; OpptyCount_Left = filter a by {{cell(team_selector_4.selection,0, "filter").asObject()}}; AvgDeal_Left = filter a by {{cell(team_selector_4.selection,0, "filter").asObject()}}; leftpipe = filter a by {{cell(team_selector_4.selection,0, "filter").asObject()}}; Activities = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.Activity.FullyQualifiedName}"; Activities = group Activities by ('User.UniqueUserName', 'Opp.IsClosed'); quota = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.forecastingquota_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}"; c = group u by 'UniqueUserName' full, OpptyCount_Left by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, AvgDeal_Left by 'User.UniqueUserName' full ,q by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, r by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, quota by 'Quota.UniqueUserName' full, Avg_Day by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, leftpipe by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, Percentage by 'User.UniqueUserName' full, Percentage_Left by 'User.UniqueUserName'; c = foreach c generate coalesce(first(u['UniqueUserName']), first(q['User.UniqueUserName']), first(AvgDeal_Left['User.UniqueUserName']), first(OpptyCount_Left['User.UniqueUserName']), first(r['User.UniqueUserName']), first(quota['Quota.UniqueUserName']), first(Avg_Day['User.UniqueUserName']), first(Percentage['User.UniqueUserName']), first(Percentage_Left['User.UniqueUserName'])) as 'UniqueUserName',  coalesce(sum(q['Amount']),0) as 'sum_Amount', (coalesce(sum(AvgDeal_Left['Amount']),0) / coalesce(count(OpptyCount_Left),0))  as 'sum_left_DealAmount', coalesce(count(OpptyCount_Left),0) as 'sum_left_count', coalesce(sum(leftpipe['Amount']),0) as 'sum_pipe', coalesce((sum(Avg_Day['CloseDate_day_epoch']) - sum(Avg_Day['CreatedDate_day_epoch']))/count(Avg_Day),0) as 'sum_DaysOpen',  coalesce(count(q) / count(r),0) as 'sum_win_rate', coalesce(sum(Percentage_Left['CompletedRate_Left']),0) as 'sum_LeftActivity', coalesce(sum(q['Amount']) / sum(quota['QuotaAmount']),0) as 'sum_QuotaAmount'; c = foreach c generate 'UniqueUserName' as 'UniqueUserName', {{cell(team_selector_4.selection,0, "first_f").asObject()}}; c = order c by ('{{cell(team_selector_4.selection,0, "left").asObject()}}' desc nulls last);

soql_user_commit_forecast.query: SELECT ForecastAmount,ForecastingItemCategory,Owner.Name,Owner.UserRole.ParentRoleId, Period.StartDate FROM ForecastingItem {{toArray( toArray("Owner.UserRoleId", "IN", row(intermediate_step.result, [0], ["UserRoleId"])), toArray("ForecastingTypeId", "IN", row(forecasting_type.selection, [0], ["ForecastingTypeId"])), toArray("OwnerId", "IN", row(intermediate_step.result, [0], ["Id"])), toArray("Period.StartDate", "BETWEEN", row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]))).asSQLWhere("sobject", true)}} AND ForecastingItemCategory = 'CommitForecast'

soql_user_quota.query: SELECT ForecastingTypeId,PeriodId,QuotaAmount,QuotaOwnerId, QuotaOwner.Name, StartDate FROM ForecastingQuota {{toArray(toArray("QuotaOwnerId", "IN", row(intermediate_step.result, [0], ["Id"])), toArray("ForecastingTypeId", "IN", row(forecasting_type.selection, [0], ["ForecastingTypeId"])), toArray("StartDate", "BETWEEN", row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]))).asSQLWhere("sobject", true)}}

soql_user_closed_won.query: SELECT ForecastAmount,ForecastingItemCategory,Owner.Name,Owner.UserRole.ParentRoleId, Period.StartDate FROM ForecastingItem {{toArray( toArray("Owner.UserRoleId", "IN", row(intermediate_step.result, [0], ["UserRoleId"])), toArray("ForecastingTypeId", "IN", row(forecasting_type.selection, [0], ["ForecastingTypeId"])), toArray("OwnerId", "IN", row(intermediate_step.result, [0], ["Id"])), toArray("Period.StartDate", "BETWEEN", row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]))).asSQLWhere("sobject", true)}} AND ForecastingItemCategory = 'ClosedOnly'

intermediate_step.query: q = load "${Apps.RevenueInsights.Datasets.userrole_revinsights.FullyQualifiedName}";q = filter q by 'ForecastEnabled' == "true";q = filter q by 'Name' == "{{cell(forecast_managers.selection, 0, "Manager").asString()}}";q = foreach q generate 'Id', 'Name', 'Roles.DeveloperName', 'Role.Role.ParentRole.Id', 'UserRoleId', 'Role.Role.ForecastUserId';
